name: A Lone
description:
Narrative game designed as part of Weekly Game Jam 84. The theme is "Alone".

Somewhat unfinished in nature.

There is a game breaking bug in all non editor builds of the game. You can't reach a core part of the narrative and the game dumps you back to main menu.Seems fine in the unity editor =(

I will add video of what it should look like I guess.
